title: Call of Duty 2 Patch Switcher - switch between 1.0, 1.2, and 1.3
description:
yo, it was programmed pretty sloppy so when you 
 put in your path make sure that there is a "/" 
 at the end of the directory name or else it is 
 not going to work at all.

 it simply switches between all the different
 versions released for cod2. have fun :)

 you can also just take all the files from the 1.0,
 1.2, and 1.3 directory and overwrite them in your 
 install path. all this program does is copy the 
 contents of the folders and moves them to your 
 Call of Duty 2 install path.

 <a href=" http://joe.07x.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://joe.07x.net</a>

  -joE
